mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dhcp_network (site_id, network, ip_type, start_ip, end_ip, start_num, end_num, ip_count, comment) VALUES ( #{site_id}, #{network}, #{ip_type}, #{start_ip}, #{end_ip}, #{start_num}, #{end_num}, #{ip_count}, #{comment} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM dhcp_network WHERE site_id=#{site_id} AND network =#{network}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dhcp_range (site_id, network, ip_type, start_ip, end_ip, start_num, end_num, ip_count, comment, disable) VALUES ( #{site_id}, #{network}, #{ip_type}, #{start_ip}, #{end_ip}, #{start_num}, #{end_num}, #{ip_count}, #{comment}, #{disable} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM dhcp_range WHERE site_id=#{site_id} AND network = #{network} AND start_ip = #{start_ip}
mapper.select: SELECT rg.* FROM dhcp_range rg, site_guest_range guest WHERE rg.site_id=#{site_id} AND rg.comment = guest.range_comment AND rg.disable = false
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dhcp_mac_filter (site_id, filter_name, filter_desc, disable, never_expires, default_expiration_time, enforce_expiration_times, insert_time, update_time) VALUES ( #{site_id}, #{filter_name}, #{filter_desc}, #{disable}, #{never_expires}, #{default_expiration_time}, #{enforce_expiration_times}, now(), now() )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM dhcp_mac_filter WHERE site_id=#{site_id} AND filter_name=#{filter_name}
mapper.select: SELECT ft.* FROM dhcp_mac_filter ft, site_blacklist_info bk WHERE ft.site_id=#{site_id} AND ft.site_id = bk.site_id AND ft.filter_name = bk.blacklist_filter_name AND ft.disable = false AND bk.blacklist_enable = true
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dhcp_fixed_ip (site_id, network, ipaddr, macaddr, ip_type, ip_num, comment, disable, ipv4_match_client ,ipv6_address_type, ipv6_duid, ipv6_prefix, ipv6_prefix_bits, update_time) VALUES ( #{site_id}, #{network}, #{ipaddr}, #{macaddr}, #{ip_type}, #{ip_num}, #{comment}, #{disable}, #{ipv4_match_client} , #{ipv6_address_type}, #{ipv6_duid}, #{ipv6_prefix}, #{ipv6_prefix_bits}, now() )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM dhcp_fixed_ip WHERE site_id=#{site_id} AND ipaddr=#{ipaddr}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM dhcp_ip_status WHERE site_id=#{site_id} AND network=#{network}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM dhcp_ip_status WHERE site_id=#{site_id} AND ipaddr=#{ipaddr}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dhcp_log (site_id, device_id, dhcp_ip, dhcp_type, ip_type, client_ip, client_mac, client_duid, collect_time) VALUES (#{site_id}, #{device_id}, #{dhcp_ip}, #{dhcp_type}, #{ip_type}, #{client_ip}, #{client_mac}, #{client_duid}, #{collect_time} )
